name: 陳晏笙
objective:
1. Basic concepts of circuit analysis
2. Advanced techniques for circuit analysis
3. Responses of RL, RC, and RLC Circuits
4. Sinusoidal steady-state analysis
schedule:
Week 1: Course Overview
Week 2: Circuit Variables 
Week 3: Circuit Elements and Kirchhoff’s Laws
Week 4: Simple Resistive Circuit Analysis
Week 5: Techniques of Circuit Analysis: Nodal Analysis
Week 6: Techniques of Circuit Analysis: Mesh Analysis
Week 7: Techniques of Circuit Analysis: Thevenin’s Theorem and Norton’s Theorem
Week 8: Techniques of Circuit Analysis: Maximum Power Transfer Theorem
Week 9: Natural Responses of RC and RL Circuits
Week 10: Step Responses of RC and RL Circuits
Week 11: Natural Responses of RLC Circuits
Week 12: Step Responses of RLC Circuits
Week 13: Sinusoidal Steady State Analysis: The Current War
Week 14: Sinusoidal Steady State Analysis: Phasors
Week 15: Sinusoidal Steady State Analysis: Circuit Analysis
Week 16*: Term project presentation
Week 17: Final exam
scorePolicy:
30% Quiz x 3
40% Final exam (covering the entire semeter)
30% Term project
materials:
1. Lecture notes available for download from Taipei Tech i-school Plus 
2. James Nilsson and Susan Riedel, Electric Circuits: 11th Edition, Pearson
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
